Local Agencies & Information
----------------------------

**Emergency Numbers**

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 911 | 911 | Local Emergency Service - routed to the Memorial Villages Police Department and Village Fire Department |
| Medical | 713-468-7941 | Ambulance Located at Village Fire Department |
| Police | 713-365-3700 | [Memorial Villages Police Department](http://mvpdtx.org), 11981 Memorial Dr., Houston, TX  77024 |
| Fire | 713-468-7941 | [Village Fire Department](http://villagefire.org/), 901 Corbindale, Houston, TX  77024 |

**Utilities**

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Electricity | 713-207-5555 | Reliant Energy |
| Gas | 713-659-2111 | CenterPoint Entex |
| Water/Sewer | 713-465-8318 | [Memorial Village Water Authority](http://www.MVWA.org), 8955 Gaylord, Houston, TX 77024-2872 |
| Telephone | 800-464-7928 | AT&T |
| Cable | 713-462-9000 | Comcast |
| Garbage Collection | 713-787-9790 | Green For Life (GFL) |

**Memorial Villages City Links**

* [Spring Valley](https://springvalleytx.com)
* [Hedwig Village](http://www.thecityofhedwigvillage.com/)
* [Hunters Creek](http://cityofhunterscreek.com/)
* [Bunker Hill](http://bunkerhilltx.gov/)
* [Hilshire Village](http://www.hilshirevillagetexas.com/)

**Other Local Area Information**

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Post Office | 800-275-8777 | 10505 Town & Country |
| Library | 713-464-1633 | Spring Branch Memorial, 930 Corbindale |
| Voter Registration | 713-755-6405 | Harris County Clerk |
| Election Questions | 713-755-5925 or 713-782-0271 |  |
| Harris Co. Auto Registration Titles | 713-368-2000 | Spring Branch Courthouse Annex, 1721 Pech, Houston, TX  77055 |
| Dept. of Public Safety | 713-465-8462 | 1601 Townhurst, Houston, TX 77043 |
| Harris County Appraisal District | 713-957-7800 | [HCAD Web Site](http://www.hcad.org) |

**Disclaimer:**  
By providing my phone City of Piney Point Village, I agree and acknowledge that City of Piney Point Village may send text messages to my wireless phone number for any purpose. Message and data rates may apply. We will only send one SMS a reply to you, and you will be able to Opt-out by replying "STOP". For more information on how your data will be handled please visit [Private Policy](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/page/city.privacy_policy)
